channel.title: Help with VPS
channel.description:
Hey users of Mopar im new to the RSPS Scene and im just looking for abit of assistance to start getting active in the community.
I've just gotton a VPS Server for free and im looking to run a RSPS off of it. Now im not totally sure how to do it but i would really like some assistance in setup of my server.
People who help will be rewarded with Admin/Mod
Cheers,
Mzil

item.title: Help with VPS
item.dc:creator: @ipkonpcp ipkonpcp
item.description:
@ipkonpcp wrote:

well it would be like doing it on normal computer honestly just go to your start>accesssories>remote desktop enter ip of your vps and log in.

go into your client files and in ur client.java search server = **...

replace the * with your vps ip and you will be able to connect from any computer with you client.

to advertise go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

click on registar server and rest really is self explantory.

but thats how u host and advertise your server

Read full topic

i dont really understand what your asking?

to host a server go to downloads section find good source code it then just download it onto ur vps and host it?
